name: disjr
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls))

|- wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
-| wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls))
-| wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))

-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))

|- wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
-| wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))

|- wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
-| wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Two ways of saying that two classes are disjoint. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2011.)
